name: Cookbo VS The Lazerds
description:
Help Cookbo ABSOLUTELY destroy these idiot Lazerds. (They probably deserve it)

Bump into your opponents to make them explode! But be careful, the Lazerds are well known to shoot lasers when things aren't going their way...

Will you manage to defeat all 5 of them?

CONTROLS :

  • Left Wheel
    • Forward: Q
    • Backward: A
  • Right Wheel
    • Forward: E
    • Backward: D
  • Start
    • Space/Enter

A real game by Oroshibu and Alphons6 made in around 12 hours for the Duo Microjam November 2022, the theme was two GIFs.
